com.camerontec.catalys.server.rules.conditions

Interface ICondition

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRuleComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConditionEvaluate, ConditionFieldsPresent, ConditionFieldsUnique, ConditionMatchAny, ConditionMatchMsgType, ConditionStaleTime, ConditionTimeInterval, ConditionValidChar, ConditionValidFIX, ConditionValidInt, ConditionValidTypeBase, ConditionValidUTCTimeStamp, NilCondition, SampleCustomCondition

    public interface ICondition
extends IRuleComponent
    All conditions should implement this interface. In addition all conditions must provide a default constructor to allow them to be constructed by the engine.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isSatisfied(IFIXMessage message)
      Checks if a message satisfies the condition.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.camerontec.catalys.server.rules.IRuleComponent

        setConfigurationObjectRegistry, setConfiguredObjectRegistry, setConnectionPointConfiguration, setMacros, setOwner, setProperties

    • Method Detail

      • isSatisfied

        boolean isSatisfied(IFIXMessage message)
             throws Exception
        Checks if a message satisfies the condition.
        Parameters:
        message - a message
        Returns:
        true if the condition is satisfied
        Throws:
        Exception - if an exception occurs when checking the condition
